analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BittechPresale.buy (/unique_chucks/13/0x14184d5ecaf7a32e675568525b39b28c33c34dc8.sol#379-405):
	External calls:
	- tokenReward.transfer(buyer,tokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0x14184d5ecaf7a32e675568525b39b28c33c34dc8.sol#387)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOfUSD (/unique_chucks/13/0x14184d5ecaf7a32e675568525b39b28c33c34dc8.sol#389-393)

BittechPresale.buy (/unique_chucks/13/0x14184d5ecaf7a32e675568525b39b28c33c34dc8.sol#379-405) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(buyer,tokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0x14184d5ecaf7a32e675568525b39b28c33c34dc8.sol#387)

BittechPresale.transferTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0x14184d5ecaf7a32e675568525b39b28c33c34dc8.sol#409-413) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(who,amount) (/unique_chucks/13/0x14184d5ecaf7a32e675568525b39b28c33c34dc8.sol#412-413)

Reentrancy in BittechPresale.buy (/unique_chucks/13/0x14184d5ecaf7a32e675568525b39b28c33c34dc8.sol#379-405):
	External calls:
	- tokenReward.transfer(buyer,tokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0x14184d5ecaf7a32e675568525b39b28c33c34dc8.sol#387)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- presaleFinished (/unique_chucks/13/0x14184d5ecaf7a32e675568525b39b28c33c34dc8.sol#398)
	- tokensRaised (/unique_chucks/13/0x14184d5ecaf7a32e675568525b39b28c33c34dc8.sol#394-397)
